messages.title: YOUR SEAT COUNTS AND EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: Some people say that Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister. But that's just not true. Remember, the opinion polls got the General Election wrong in 2015. They got the EU referendum wrong, and as Jeremy Corbyn has himself said, he was a 200-1 outside chance for the Labour leadership. With so much at stake, it is not worth taking the risk of Jeremy Corbyn becoming Prime Minister – even as part of a coalition government or hung parliament.

messages.title: BACK ME AND REBECCA POW WITH YOUR POSTAL VOTE HERE IN TAUNTON DEANE CONSTITUENCY
messages.content: If you want to make a real difference, back me by voting for my candidate, Rebecca Pow, in your local constituency of Taunton Deane. You will have a say in a strong and stable government, that will deliver the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.
By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for the Liberal Democrats in Taunton Deane constituency is a wasted vote. All it will do is create a hung parliament and end in chaos, giving Jeremy Corbyn a route to becoming Prime Minister.

issues.brexitEurope: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity.
issues.economy: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security.

endorsements.endorsement: Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest to see us through Brexit and beyond.

quotes.text: Labour under Jeremy Corbyn are a shambles and he would embarrass Britain in Brussels and risk our economic security.
